content.p: The Kuala Lumpur Teaching Centre (KLTC) is located in Chulan Tower on Jalan Conlay within Kuala Lumpur city centre. Certain postgraduate programmes such as applied psychology, business and management, and education are delivered here. The drive from campus to the KLTC should take approximately 45 minutes. See the google map for directions. Parking facilities in the Chulan Tower cost RM5 for the first hour and RM3 for each subsequent hour. Please see the bus information from campus to Kuala Lumpur. There are two monorail stations within easy walking distance of the KLTC, Raja Chulan and Bukit Bintang. The monorail service runs between KL Sentral Station and Titiwangsa. Taxis are readily available in Kuala Lumpur, Kajang and Semenyih. Please be aware that taxis in Kajang do not operate on a meter and you will need to negotiate the cost of the trip before starting. A taxi from campus to the KLTC should cost approximately RM70. The University of Nottingham Teaching Centre Level 2, Chulan Tower No 3 Jalan Conlay 50450 Kuala Lumpur Malaysia telephone: +603 8924 8388 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my Download a PDF of the location map. Map and directions from campus to KLTC. Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia THE UNIVERSITY OF NOTTINGHAM IN MALAYSIA SDN. BHD. DULN001(B) (473520-K) telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
